title: Jatta
description: Jatta is a princess in the kingdom of Alteeda, but her life is no fairy tale.Her mother was slain by werewolves when Jatta was three years old, and the palace has been haunted by fear ever since.Then Jatta wakes one morning, bruised and disoriented , soaked in sweat, to see her bedroom smeared with bloody paw prints â€¦
author: Jenny Hale
